post_title: FS: Wagner (bat on left) PSA 5.5 with impression cylinder ghost
post_content:
$1250 no fees or $1300 pp goods delivered. Scans in the slabs haven't been enhanced the back scan without the slab has contrast added.

EDIT: I started a Thread in the main board room about this type of error.  Please feel free to reply there so we don't ruin your sale thread anymore than I have already.  Thank you.
